verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
The Bible stands tho' the hills may tumble,
It will firmly stand when the earth shall crumble.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
I will plant my feet on its firm foundation,
For the Bible stands

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
The Bible stands like a rock undaunted,
Mid the raging storms
of time.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Its pages burn with the truth eternal,
And they glow with a light sublime.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
The Bible stands like a mountain towering,
Far above the works of man.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Its truth by none
ever was refuted,
And destroy it
they never can.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
The Bible stands, and it will forever,
When the world
has passed away.

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
By inspiration
it has been given,
All its precepts
I will obey.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
The Bible stands
every test we give it,
For its Author is divine.

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
By grace alone
I expect to live it,
And to prove it
and make it mine.
